comments: Start at 150, and repeatedly apply the map x -> Sum of divisors of x excluding x.
references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, B6.
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..177
maple: f := proc(n) option remember; if n = 0 then 150; else sigma(f(n-1))-f(n-1); fi; end:
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
